title: 3Fun vs Feeld for Couples: Honest Comparison (2026)
description: Comparing 3Fun and Feeld for couple dating. Which app is better for threesomes, finding thirds, and ethical non-monogamous couple dating?

body.raw:
If you're a couple looking to date together, two apps come up most often: 3Fun and Feeld. Both support couple dating, but they take different approaches and attract different audiences.

This comparison helps you understand which app—or combination—works better for your situation.

---

## The Core Difference

**3Fun:** Built specifically for threesomes and couple dating. That's its entire purpose.

**Feeld:** Built for open-minded dating broadly—ENM, kink, curiosity, and yes, couples and threesomes too.

This fundamental difference shapes everything about how each app feels and works.

---

## Quick Comparison

| Feature | 3Fun | Feeld |
|---------|------|-------|
| **Primary purpose** | Threesomes | Open-minded dating |
| **Couple profiles** | Joint profile | Paired individual profiles |
| **User mindset** | Seeking threesomes | Varied (casual to serious) |
| **Kink features** | Basic | Extensive (Desires) |
| **Relationship potential** | Lower | Higher |
| **User quality** | Varies | Generally higher |
| **Flake rate** | Higher | Lower |
| **Privacy features** | Basic | Strong (Incognito) |

---

## How Couple Profiles Work

### On 3Fun

**Joint profile approach:**
- Create one profile representing both partners
- Upload photos of each person and together
- Write one shared bio
- Swipe and match as a unit
- Messages go to shared inbox

**Pros:**
- Simple to manage
- Clear couple presentation
- One conversation thread per match

**Cons:**
- Less individual identity
- Harder to show personalities separately
- Some people prefer knowing who they're talking to

### On Feeld

**Paired profiles approach:**
- Each partner creates their own profile
- Profiles are linked together
- Both are visible to potential matches
- Each has their own photos, bio, Desires
- Can swipe together or separately

**Pros:**
- Each person maintains individual identity
- Matches can learn about both partners
- More personal feel
- Designed for ethical couple dating

**Cons:**
- More setup work
- Two profiles to maintain
- Can feel less unified

---

## User Base Comparison

### 3Fun Users

**What you'll find:**
- People specifically seeking threesomes
- Mix of singles and couples
- More hookup-oriented mindset
- Direct about physical interests
- Varied quality and seriousness

**The vibe:** Transactional, direct, focused on the act itself

### Feeld Users

**What you'll find:**
- ENM-experienced people
- Kink-curious and kink-active
- Mix of casual and relationship-seeking
- Generally more thoughtful about ethics
- Higher investment in genuine connection

**The vibe:** Exploratory, community-minded, values connection

---

## For Different Goals

### If You Want a One-Time Threesome

**3Fun:** Direct path. Everyone's here for the same thing. Less pretense.

**Feeld:** Works too, but you'll encounter people seeking more than hookups.

**Better choice:** 3Fun if speed matters; Feeld if you want better quality interactions

### If You Want an Ongoing Third

**3Fun:** Possible, but the app culture skews casual. Many users aren't seeking ongoing.

**Feeld:** Better suited. User base includes people seeking relationships, not just encounters.

**Better choice:** Feeld

### If You Want to Date Another Couple

**3Fun:** Has couple-matching features. Purpose-built for this.

**Feeld:** Works well with Desires signaling. Quality tends higher.

**Better choice:** Try both; Feeld often has more committed couple users

### If You're New to This

**3Fun:** Steep learning curve in terms of culture. Can feel overwhelming.

**Feeld:** More forgiving. User base tends to be more patient with newcomers.

**Better choice:** Feeld

---

## Communication Differences

### 3Fun Messaging

**The experience:**
- Often very direct/sexual from the start
- Less emphasis on getting to know each other
- Higher flake rate (matches that never respond)
- Conversations can feel like negotiations

### Feeld Messaging

**The experience:**
- More variety in conversation style
- Room for connection-building
- Lower flake rate generally
- People more likely to follow through

---

## Quality and Safety

### 3Fun

**Reality:**
- Significant bot/fake profile problem
- Inconsistent verification
- Some scam accounts
- Quality varies widely
- Need good judgment filtering

### Feeld

**Reality:**
- Better moderation generally
- Verification options available
- Fewer obvious fakes
- User base self-polices somewhat
- Still requires judgment, but less filtering

---

## Privacy Comparison

### 3Fun Privacy

- Basic hide features
- Can limit profile visibility
- No advanced privacy modes
- Discrete-ish but not robust

### Feeld Privacy

- Incognito mode (premium)—only visible to people you like
- Strong privacy controls
- Better for people with discretion needs
- Hide from contacts possible

**For discretion:** Feeld wins with Incognito mode

---

## Cost Comparison

### 3Fun Pricing

**Free:**
- Basic swiping
- Limited likes
- Messaging with matches

**Premium:**
- See who liked you
- Unlimited likes
- Advanced filters
- Typically $15-25/month

### Feeld Pricing

**Free:**
- Basic swiping and matching
- Limited daily likes
- Messaging

**Majestic:**
- See who liked you
- Advanced filters
- Incognito mode
- More pings
- Typically $15-30/month

**Similar pricing, different value:** Feeld's premium features (especially Incognito) offer more unique value.

---

## The Flake Factor

Let's be honest about one of the biggest differences:

### 3Fun Flakiness

- Higher rate of matches that never respond
- More "maybe" conversations that go nowhere
- People browsing without serious intent
- Fantasy vs. reality gap

### Feeld Flakiness

- Still happens (it's dating apps after all)
- But lower rate overall
- More people follow through
- Expectations are clearer

**Why this matters:** Your time is limited. Lower flake rates mean more actual connections.

---

## Who Uses Each App

### Typical 3Fun Users

- Specifically seeking threesomes
- May be less ENM-experienced
- More focused on physical experience
- Varied relationship awareness

### Typical Feeld Users

- ENM lifestyle practitioners
- More relationship-oriented
- Kink-aware and sex-positive
- Generally more thoughtful about ethics

---

## The Verdict

### Choose 3Fun If:

- You specifically want threesomes (not ongoing relationships)
- You prefer direct/transactional interactions
- You want to supplement Feeld with more options
- You don't mind filtering through lower quality
- Quick encounters are your goal

### Choose Feeld If:

- You want higher quality interactions
- You're open to ongoing connections
- You value ethical ENM practices
- Privacy/discretion matters
- You want kink compatibility signals

### Use Both If:

- You want maximum options
- You have time to manage both
- You're in an area where one might have limited users
- You're exploring and want to compare

---

## Making Either App Work

Whichever you choose, success comes down to:
- Clear, honest profiles
- Good photos of both partners
- Ethical communication
- Treating potential thirds as full humans

Poise helps couples write profiles that attract compatible matches and navigate conversations on any platform. Because finding a third is hard enough without communication struggles.

[Download Poise and improve your couple dating success.](/download)
